features: EVERY PURCHASE SAVES PETS. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets.
SWIVEL STEERING FOR MAXIMUM MANEUVERABILITY. Makes cleaning around furniture and other obstacles easy. Filter replacement every 6 months
TRIPLE ACTION BRUSH ROLL. Loosens, lifts and removes embedded pet hair.
MULTI-SURFACE CLEANING WITH SCATTER-FREE TECHNOLOGY. Stop the scatter when tackling dry pet messes on hard surfaces.
EDGE-TO-EDGE CLEANING. Tackle pet hair, dirt, and debris along edges and in corners.
SPECIALIZED PET TOOLS INCLUDED. Comes with Pet TurboEraser tool to clean stairs, upholstery and more.
EASY EMPTY DIRT TANK. Opens at the bottom with the press of a button, so cleaning up after cleanup is quick and mess-free.
body.description: BISSELL® CleanView® Swivel Pet upright vacuum gives you the outstanding performance you’d expect from an expert floorcare company at a great price. It has specialized pet tools and features, so you know it’s designed for homes with pets. The TRIPLE ACTION™ Brush Roll lifts, loosens and removes embedded pet hair and its silk-like bristles work gently on hard floors to remove fine debris while also keeping it contained with Scatter-Free Technology. Just as its name suggests, CleanView® Swivel Pet vacuum has Swivel Steering to get around and under furniture and other obstacles in your home. Pair that with edge-to-edge cleaning capabilities and you can clean with confidence knowing that you’re getting more with each pass. As the vacuum captures dirt and debris, it passes through a filter while the multi-cyclonic suction helps keep dirt away from the motor and post-motor filter, for extended durability. At BISSELL, we know messes are not just contained to the floor, that’s why we packed CleanView® Swivel Pet vacuum with specialized pet tools that carry right on the machine – giving you convenient pet cleaning, on or above the floor. And this machine doesn't just clean up after pets, it helps save them! BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: More maneuverable, more convenient. Capture pet hair and debris under and around furniture.

3X Brush Roll Action TRIPLE ACTION Brush Roll works to loosen, lift and remove embedded dirt and pet hair. Scatter-Free Technology Clean dry pet messes on hard floors with less scatter. Edge-To-Edge Cleaning Picks up pet hair from one edge of the Brush Roll to the other. Multi-Cyclonic Suction System Extended performance with No Loss of Suction.* *Tested per IEC 60312-1 with multiple dust loadings, results within accepted tolerance of 5%.

Pet TurboEraser Tool Easily removes embedded pet hair and dirt from carpet, stairs, upholstery, and more. Crevice Tool Attach the crevice tool to the hose for above-floor cleaning. Washable Filter Machine maintenance is easy with washable filters and a multi-level filtration system that keeps filters cleaner, longer. Easy Empty Dirt Tank Emptying this dirt tank is as easy as pushing a button!
See CleanView Swivel Pet vacuum in action! Power through pet hair and other messes with this versatile vacuum.

Every Purchase Saves Pets BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum has great power. The dirt container is very large. Never had a swivel type before and not used to it but it's OK. The attachments are convienent and the stair/upholstory attachment works great. Leaves the carpet looking much cleaner than our old vac and I don't have to cut out hair from the roller like the old one. It's a bit heavier and like every vacuum the cord is 6" too short to make it end up wrapping correctly (EVERY vac has this problem - why can't they figure it out?). All in all I'm very happy with it. Does a great job and the price was right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This Bissell 2252 sweeper does what it claims to do and does it very well. It is a wee bit heavy, but I can manage heavy since it cleans so well. The newer cool-looking cordless "wand" sweepers are nice and convenient and light weight and I have had four of them, and I like them just fine except for the fact that they simply do not clean very well, and they do not have the suction power like this sweeper does! This sweeper is large and not as cool- looking but it cleans! It was priced competitive to the others as well, so the Bissell 2252 was a much better choice, and I am delighted with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m so pleased that this vacuum sucks up my short haired dogs fur. My old one wouldn’t pick it up. This vacuum seems very powerful and the handheld pet hair accessory works wonderfully so far. The amount of dirt picked up from my rug was impressive esp considering my livingroom rug is a flat weave rug that looked perfectly clean there was a lot of dirt settled into it that my old one wasn’t picking up. Unlike some other reviews I absolutely love the swivel technology it makes such smooth corners and direction adjustments. Very reasonable price as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good. Item works as expected.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to replace a Eureka Powerful NEU202. The Eureka (lasted less than two years) was a horrible choice and a vast downgrade from the previous version which I did like. It went together with ease, as most of them do, although you do need to screw in two screws for the handle. The Bissell works well and picks up pet hair great (the Eureka's dust cup would get clogged every few min..) The suction seems fine and the attachments are adequate. I have not used the pet turbo yet, as I have used those on a few other vacuums, and they all seem to work about the same and have the same failings. No new vacuum seems made to last now a days, as they are all made out of plastic. The cord is not long enough to do a large room, however not many of them are. I do miss the cord rewind and the lights on the Eureka, however most important was finding a vacuum that would actually work for sand (living in Florida that is a must) and pet hair without having to unclog something every five or ten minutes. We have four dogs, three of which have long hair. Of those three, two of them shed a few times a year. The Bissell had no problems with the hair. I thought I would dislike the swivel feature, however I hardly noticed it when vacuuming. So I can not say if that is an improvement or not, at least it is not a negative. I can not speak to it's durability, as I have only just received it, but I can say so far it is a great improvement over the Eureka, and as of now, I am happy with the purchase. I will update this review in a year or so (or sooner if it develops issues.)Pros:Washable filterDoes not have a filter cup that clogs continuously.a Few decent attachmentsGood suctionPicks up pet hair easilyCons:Cord is shorter than one would like.The extension attachment could be longerPlastic everything (But almost all of them are now.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I was on the market for a new vacuum because our other was dying and did not suck as strong as we needed! I should have started looking sooner, but it’s been about 6 months since we’ve had a good vacuum across all the rooms in our house. I had a baby 6 months ago - and you know how it goes! 😆We don’t have a pet, but we do host a lot and love to have friends over for dinner. That being said, there’s always someone coming and going so I wanted to have a pet grade vacuum.I swiffer our house every week, and we are a very clean family…So when I finally landed on this vacuum, I didn’t know what to expect but the reviews were good! And this vacuum is AMAZING. This picture shows how much I got up from our carpets and rugs in one go. It was easy to put together, the cord is long enough, it’s easy to empty the canister, and I like that you can use it on carpet and hardwood. It’s not hard to push, and doesn’t smell up the house like some vacuums tend to.Even if you don’t have a pet, this is a great choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and exceptionally long cord!
reviews.reviewText: I cannot days enough good things about my new vacuum. Since I broke my arm/hand, it has been difficult to keep my floors clean. From the first time I plugged this vacuum in, I knew it was a wonder. Floors and area rugs look brand new, and the long cord allows me to plug the vacuum in ONE TIME for each floor of my house! What a life changer for me. I can manage this vacuum with one arm, and it pulls out so much dirt/hair out of my carpets. Thank you Bissel! I've been searching awhile now to find what I needed. I also have an inexpensive robot disc for when I'm too tired to vacuum but this item works great, and picks up what the robot didn't. Robot disks cannot go up the stairs either.
Es muy buena, potente y aspira polvo sin regarlo, todos los cabellos y pelusas se van. además es muy fácil de vaciar toda la basura y limpiar los filtros

We received this product and I was very happy with how easy it was to put together however, I then tested the vacuum on a low pile rug and within 20 seconds the motor blew and flames appeared from the vacuum, burning and melting the plastic. I have been offered a refund as I believe it is a faulty motor however, the cost of posting the vacuum from Singapore to the USA is simply not worth it.

reviews.reviewTitle: EXCELLENT value for money, FAR BETTER THEN DYSON (from a confirmed Dyson user x 15 yrs)
reviews.reviewText: I just purchased this and it arrived last night. I put it together within 5-10 min and tried it out right away. I have always had DYSON PET-version vacuums for the past 15 years, so this was the first time I tried something much less expensive and non-Dyson.LOVE IT. The suction is way better than Dyson, even brand new out of the box. It is very lightweight and easy to maneuver, and I far prefer how the hose attachments stow and how easily they are put on the hose when needed. It’s very easy to empty the canister, and when emptying the debris falls out much more easily than it every did on my Dysons. Also, the powerhead seamlessly goes from hard floors to low-pile mats and even my Great Dane’s dog beds without having to change the setting (I kept it on 2 the whole time). And, the powerhead does a far better job of getting the edges clean than my Dyson did.The only downfall is that the cord length is about 10’ shorter than my Dyson, so I have to re-plug it in as I go through the house (the Dyson reached everywhere in my raised bungalow without unplugging it). That’s a minor inconvenience, easily fixed with an extension cord if I so choose, and not enough to lose any stars over.Obviously, longevity is an unknown. But, for the far more economical price I paid for this compared to any EXPENSIVE Dyson I’ve bought in the past, replacing it every few years if needed is no big deal.

Muy buen producto, tras leer muchos comentarios tuve algunas dudas al final me animé y este es mi resumen.-Excelente succión, no tengo alfombras en la casa sólo un tapete enorme y en realidad hace un excelente trabajo tanto en piso como en tapetes.-La comparamos con una aspiradora Koblenz que tiene mi mamá (según muy potente), después de aspirar con la Koblenz pasé la Bissel y sacó un contenedor completo de basura 😱.-En varios comentarios leí que se ve frágil, no sé de qué plástico indestructible eran las aspiradoras anteriores de ellos pero yo la veo igual que cualquier aspiradora, de hecho se siente resistente.-El accesorio para pelo de perro no sirve, al ponerlo gira de maravilla pero al pasarlo por el sofá o lo que sea se detiene por completo.-La manguera para usar los accesorios es muy corta, al no poderla estirar mucho se te viene encima la aspiradora.-El cable es corto, en la misma habitación tengo que cambiarla de conexión.En general estoy muy satisfecha, sin duda volvería a comprar de ésta marca.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena potencia, cumple lo que promete pero...
reviews.reviewText: Me gusta mucho la potencia para quitar los pelos de las telas, cumple lo que promete sin embargo la herramienta para los sofás es muy delicada, desde el primer uso varios dientillos salieron volando y actualmente solo le quedan 2, también me gustó que el cable es largo y puedes llegar a más lugares de la casa pero lo tienes que ir sujetando porque estorba al momento de aspirar, pero apesar de esos inconvenientes es muy buena aspiradora, la mejor que he comprado hasta ahora pensada para mascotas.
